name: Shahidul Islam Hridoy
title: Associate, Head of Lower Courts management
description: Mr. Md. Shahidul Islam has been a practicing as an Apprentice lawyer of the Dhaka Judge Court since 2021. He completed his LL.B. (Hons) and LL.M. degrees from Eastern University, Bangladesh. Mr. Shahidul assists the firm in both Civil and Criminal litigation matters, which includes but is not limited to drafting different types of legal documents, Writ petitions and assisting in hearings in the court proceedings.

name: Masuma Dil Afroz
title: Associate, Head of Research
department: International law, Civil law, Human rights and Communications
description: Ms. Masuma Afroz is the head of research for all legal proceedings and trials especially concerning international clients, civil matters and the violations of rights. She is equally skilled in legal drafting and regularly assists the litigation team in writing and reviewing the necessary documentations. She is also leading the compilation of the law report series by the firm called Libri In Re (LIR) and occasionally advises the firm in social media management.Ms. Masuma completed her LL.B. and LL.M. from Eastern University, Bangladesh with the Vice Chancellor’s Gold Medal for the undergraduate faculty of law in 2019. She also completed an Advanced Masters in International Humanitarian Law and Human Rights from the Geneva Academy in Switzerland as a Hans Wilsdorf Scholar in 2021. name: Zobayer Hoshen
title: Senior Associate, Head of Customs & Company Law
description: Mr. Zobayer Hoshen completed his graduation in LL.B. (Hons) and post-graduation in LL.M. from Eastern University. He works on all Customs and Company related matters. He regularly works providing opinion on local corporate and commercial transaction and drafting all the relevant documents.

name: Umme Salma
title: Legal Assistant
description: Advocate Umme Salma is providing her legal expertise and support in legal documentation for Civil and Criminal Laws on ad-hoc basis at Lima & Associates. She also regularly assisting the research department. Mrs. Salma completed her education in Law from Dhaka Law College and was enrolled as a member of the Dhaka Bar Council in 2013. She is now preparing for her membership at the Supreme Court of Bangladesh. Besides her legal aptitudes, she is a member of the board of trustees at Sonargoan University, Bangladesh.  There, she is also leading social work as the President of the Complaint Committee by advocating and protecting against any violations met by students.

name: Amrin Nuzhat Momo
title: Legal Assistant
department: Research, Civil law and Criminal la
description: Ms. Amrin Nuzhat is working as a research assistant and is also supporting various legal documentation for Civil and Criminal laws. Ms. Nuzhat has experience working with renowned volunteer organizations of UNHCR and UNICEF. She has been acting as the General Secretary of Prothom Alo Bondhushova for the past three years. She is currently studying LL.B. at Eastern University, Bangladesh
